game.name: Hot Wheels
game.description: Fun and challenging racing game. Play with your super-red car and make your best results. Besides achieving the best results, you need to make the best time on the oncoming lane, you need to be adept and do more "near miss" and "super miss" avoiding cars from a direct collision. Let try!
